currentProject.quote: [Jordan is] quick to offer help, advice, and encouragement. Other members of our team respect his technical skill and seek out his opinions. As a result, heâ€™s had multiple leading opportunities working with small teams, large teams, and direct one-on-one consultation work with clients...He began making an impact on Day One. Jordan has consistently delivered as a developer, team mate, and leader. This is what truly makes Jordan stand out. <mark>Not only is he a talented, experienced developer, he goes the extra mile in everything that he does.</mark>
